channel.title: 3rd party client connections
channel.description: My server automatically blocks connections from third party clients and only allows them from my client. The problem is that I just started my own client and I would like for my server to allow connections from any client. Im using a delta base, how would I go about doing this?

item.title: 3rd party client connections
item.dc:creator: @theUnforgiven theUnforgiven
item.description:
@theUnforgiven wrote:

My server automatically blocks connections from third party clients and only allows them from my client. The problem is that I just started my own client and I would like for my server to allow connections from any client. Im using a delta base, how would I go about doing this?

Read full topic
